Carol Danvers.
Once a pilot, now contains the powers of flight, super strength, energy manipulation, etc.

11211.title: The always strong Ms. Marvel.

112111.content:
Carol had enough!
It has been several months into Norman Osborn's Dark Reign and she has been replaced by an impostor! What's worse, it's the "reformed" criminal Moonstone, who is parading around in her old outfit! There was not much Carol could do but endure this humiliation but stay in hiding as the bad guys ran free.
Until recently...
As Carol was walking down to a friends house, she notice a red glint over head. There was Moonstone, flying into a seemingly empty warehouse. Carol knew that she shouldn't, but she decided to investigate this incident. Upon entering the building, she observed the psycho psychiatrist from afar. But her voice was clearly audible.
"Oh, thank God it's still here!" Said a relieved Moonstone. "If this weapon disappeared, Osborn would have freaked." She then held up an odd, cylinder shape gun. "It's gonna be helpful against those bothersome heroes. Personally, I prefer using my fists, but if this gets rid of them with less hassle and less mess."
Carol new this was time to strike. She began to get into her outfit and took on the role of Ms. Marvel. With her stretchy black spandex that covered her torso and the sash like red belt. Her yellow zig-zag symbol was loud and proud.
"It would be fun..." Continued Moonstone, "if I could use it on that cow Ms. Marvel!"
Just as Ms. Marvel changed, that comment broke her concentration. Ms. Marvel then shot out at Moonstone, as the villain turned around with the gun aimed at her.
But Ms. Mavel slammed her before she could pull the trigger! The two smashed through a wall and into the city streets.
Ms. Marvel pinned the impostor against the wall of a building, but the gun slipped from her fingers and hit the ground. The trigger went off, and a laser beam hit-
112111.title: I hear there's an impostor.

choices: Her stomach surges forward a foot.
1121111.content:
The red laser hit Ms. Marvel right in the stomach.
She cringes, but there is no pain. There weapon did absolutely nothing. No pain and no discomfort. Ms. Marvel looked at the face of Moonstone, who still looked smug.
Ms. Marvel asked, "What are you so happy about? Your weapon did absolutely nothing. So looks like I can just bash you for intent to-" she stops. Something doesn't feel right.
Moonstone replied, "You can say this is my lucky day! Not so much the finding you part. Hell, I expected you to follow me into the warehouse." Ms. Marvel started to feel her stomach, and felt oddly full.
"You see," she continued, "If your still around, then your more likely to take my title away-"
"My Title!" cried the agitated Ms. Marvel, bending over to try to relieve the pressure.
"You were always so stubborn. As I was saying, luck is on my side today, seeing how the shot still hit you. But I guess that's the lesson you'll learn when-"
Ms. Marvel had enough. She raised her fist, despite the cramping, and was gonna smash Moonstone's face in. She winds up and-
1121111.title: The laser strikes Ms. Marvel

was able to catch her breath as the inflation stopped.
11211111.content:
*GLOMP*
Ms. Marvel's stomach pushed forward. She stared down in shock at what her body had done. There was now a round bump that redefined the shape of the super heroine. "What did-?!"
"Oh that? That's just early bloating. What you should really worry about is-Oh Hey!" Moonstone waved to the pedestrians who started to walk towards the commotion. "Don't mind me! I'm just taking care of this evil impostor!"
"WHY YOU-!" Ms. Marvel was cut off again. A feeling of fullness started to spread through out her body. She began to struggle to find out what to do to alleviate this feeling, but it started to spread. Suddenly, her breasts, ass and stomach all started pushing outwards.
(This is impossible!) Ms. Marvel thought. (I-I'm blowing up!) She began to feel all around her stomach. Her fingers began to press against her growing flesh and they sunk in a bit. Though her stomach was gurgling, she felt no fluids. It was almost like-(I'm becoming a balloon!) Her eyes began to widen.
"What's happening to her?!" Asked one of the pedestrians.
"Oh that?" Moonstone smirked, "Some weird reaction. You see, she's a clone of me, and-"
Ms. Marvel didn't bother listening to her lies. She was more concerned with the discomfort in her midsection as her stomach started to build up around her belt.
(Umf! This hurts!) Ms. Marvel screamed in her head. (If this belt doesn't come off, I--I'll--)
RIIIIP!
The red belt that snugly fit around her stomach was now torn to shreds. Ms. Marvel sighed in relief, being distracted from her current situation.
Currently, she is still the same height, but her stomach is massive and almost touching the ground with her billowing breast sitting on top. Ms. Marvel-
11211111.title: Her stomach surges forward a foot.

112111111.content:
But there was no time for her to relax. Her body growth started affecting her limbs.
As she tried to sway her body around, her arms suddenly shot upwards and were on either side of her and her legs started to spread apart.
(This will hinder my movement! How will I get out of this!) Ms. Marvel continued to think. Her back also started to round out.
"So how big will she grow?" asked another civilian.
Moonstone turned and cocked her head at Mrs. Marvel. "Oh, I don't know. I mean, she SHOULD HAVE stopped by now." Moonstone gave a taunting wink.
"You won't get away with this!" The blond head shouted on top of the black spandex sphere that was her body. Her arms were soon consumed by the mass, as well as her legs. Her appearance was a big black ball with a head on top, hands sticking out of both ends, two wiggling feet, and a pair of inflated breasts. The zig-zag yellow symbol on her chest stretched from the top of her body to bottom.
"Oh? I think your evil deeds are through!" Moonstone started to play up to here "hero" rule in front of the civilians. "For you see, you-"
Moonstone was cut off when-
112111111.title: Ms. Marvel becomes a sphere.

choices: And it's about to get worse!
Some other option i didn't think of?
1121111111.content:
Ms. Marvel's round body sudden gave a jolt. Moonstone smile started to wan. The sphere that is Ms. Marvel was not just growing outwards, but upwards, as it started to become seven feet wide and growing. Ms. Marvel's head darted from left to right, scared at the most recent development.
"So how big is she supposed to get?" One of the pedestrians asked.
"I...I don't know." Moonstone responded with the first hint of fear in her voice, as the black ball started to grow past the 8 and a half foot mark.
Ms. Marvel stared back at her nemesis with a look of hopelessness.
At the 9 ft. mark, Moonstone knew she had to act. "Stand back!" She shouted. (If she gets too big...) the thought started to chill Moonstone. She then took notice that now ten foot sphere was going into the street. (Oh no no no no!)
Moonstone jumped upwards and slammed her fist into the ground, breaking the pavement so that the cars would not run into her. Ms. Marvel bounced up and hit the ground, causing her to begin to roll backwards.
(This is INSANE!) Carol thought. (If I keep growing, I might-...no, don't even think about it.) She was now approaching the twelve foot mark and was pressing against the side of a building as well.
Moonstone turned her head and examined the structure. There was a sharp edge sticking of the side of the building. (Not good!) Moonstone sped to where the black sphere and structure met, and wedged her arms in between the two. (I need to get her away from the buildings! If one of those edges connects with her skin-) Moonstone then pushed the 14 ft. sphere into the road.
Ms. Marvel became baffled and dizzy as the world around her started to spin.
From the pedestrian standpoint, who were getting out of their cars to observe this odd occurrence, they simply saw their beloved super heroine pushing a large black and yellow ball into the center of the street.
When Ms. Marvel stopped rolling, she was now 16 feet wide, and was challenging the heights of the buildings around her. There was just a few more feet left for her to grow before she was wedged between both buildings again.
(This is not good! Not good!) Both Ms. Marvel and Moonstone thought.
1121111111.title: Ms. Marvel starts growing larger

choices: Another hero arrives at the scene.
11211111111.content:
Moonstone then flew up and landed on ballooning Ms. Marvel while the crowd started to double in size. Each step onto the black sphere felt firm and there was not much give. (She reaching the end.) Thought Moonstone.
She took several steps towards the blond head among the sea of stretch spandex. Ms. Marvels cheeks were puffing up, making her look rather humorous.
"I guess this is the part where you begin to gloat." said a defeated Ms. Marvel.
"Yeah, I guess..." replied the dismayed Moonstone.
"So what are you going to do to me now? I'm an easy target."
"I didn't think that this situation would get this out of hand."
"What? You didn't expect me to blow up like a balloon?!" As Ms. Marvel said this, Moonstone looked around and saw that she could see the top of the nearby buildings from her vantage point and her view was rising.
"The weapon was not supposed to go this far though. The tests for this weapon usually had people stop at the basic sphere stage. You on the other hand...I guess your powers made you that much more durable." Moonstone started to look around the massive orb. "They usually pop a lot sooner-"
Ms. Marvel eyes widen at the sound of that word. She was not just going to be confined as a balloon, but was going to explode like one. She started to realize how much trouble she was in as her head started to sink into her body as it reached its 23 ft mark. She began to flail her hands wildly, but couldn't muster much strength in their bloated form.
"Do something! DO SOMETHING!" begged Ms. Marvel.
"What can I do?!" Moonstone said in despair "It's not like-"
11211111111.title: And it's about to get worse!

112111111111.content:
"What the hell is going on?!" Boomed the angry voice of Norman Osborn over the communicator.
"There was a slight mishap! I-" Moonstone tried to respond.
"Mishap?! There's a bomb growing downtown, and you're gonna be the one responsible for this! And you know who that reflects badly on?! ME!" Norman continued to rant.
"I-I-I was only trying to get rid of-"
Ms. Marvel sighed. Here she was growing to a bursting point, and the last thing she'll hear is a hard ass yell at his employee. Carol started to feel uncomfortable as her skin began to get taut.
"This is a disaster on a massive scale!" Norman continued, "Shut off the process immediately!"
"Shut it...off?"
"Yes! Shoot her again with the rifle! That stops the process! DO IT N-"
Moonstone darted off of Ms. Marvel. Unable to hear the last part of the conversation, Ms. Marvel started to think about exploding. Her chest began to push up against her chin, and her head was stuck staring outwards, at the two large breast like mountains obscuring her view. She was reaching 25 feet in size and all over she felt very tight. There wasn't any pain, but it felt uncomfortable. Her body began to quiver, and she began to squint her eyes. (Well, this looks like it's it!) Ms. Marvel then bit her bottom lip and waited for the loud bang.
...
...
But nothing happened.
She slowly began to open her eyes again, only to see Moonstone standing in front of her, with the rifle in her hand.
"I guess the thing you should be saying it thank you." She joked.
112111111111.title: Suddenly, Moonstone's communicator rings.

1121111111112.content:
Ms. Marvel sighed in relief. Her body felt like on the verge of popping, but now, she was safe.
Moonstone then called back to Osborn, "OK, I stopped her. Can I-"
"NO!" Screamed Norman Osborn "You almost caused a bomb blast that could have taken out several blocks! You publicly screwed up, and I'm going to face the backlash! I'm coming over there now, and when I do, you are off the team! You're going back into the comfort of a cell! They are gonna lock you up for-"
Moonstone turned off the communicator. She felt like she hit a dead end. (He's acting like I actually let her explode! He can still recover from this! He'll still get away with this! If she did explode, he'd-) Moonstone started to get a sadistic smile on her face.
From the street level view, the people started to gather all around to observe the twenty five foot black sphere with the yellow stripe across it. They could see Moonstone standing between the blown up breasts facing them. She suddenly turned around and disappeared from site.
Ms. Marvel was breathing easy. All she had to do now was wait for Moonstone to turn her back to normal, and she would be on her way.
Moonstone then knelt in front of her face.
"I'm so relieved. Thanks for coming to your senses and saving me" Ms. Marvel said in exhaustion. Moonstone then poked her fingers into her side.
"You're REALLY full, aren't cha?" Moonstone said playfully.
"Yes, now if you'd please-" Ms. Marvel got interrupted as Moonstone planted her lips onto her own. Carol was stunned. There was no hint that she was going to perform such a deed.
They held the kiss for a good thirty seconds, until Moonstone pulled back.
Ms. Marvel was dumbstruck. "...Where did THAT come from?!'
Moonstone smiled back. "I just wanted to give you a good moment before I do what I'm about to do."
Ms. Marvel stared with a confused look. "What do you mean?"
"Well, I'm officially out of the job." Moonstone started to kneel down. "Norman's gonna put me back in a cell, and there's not much I can do against him." She placed her other knee on her inflated body. "So I figured, why not get the last laugh on him?" Moonstone began to lie down. "I mean, it's just a few blocks and you and me." She placed one hand around the back of Ms. Marvel's head. "And I'm certain you don't hold most of the people in this country in high regard after they voted Norman into office". She then wrapped the other hand around Carols head.
Ms. Marvel curious face then transformed into one of shock. "Moonstone! You aren't going to-"
Moonstone then smiled back at Carol. "Happy Poppings!"
She then planted her lips firmly onto Ms. Marvel's. Ms. Marvel tried to resist, but Moonstone gave one, tiny, little puff...

BANG!!!

12132.content:
Temari was on her way to visit the hidden leaf village. It was nothing urgent, but she had a letter to deliver to the Hokage and be on her way out.
She decided that she wanted to feel nostalgic today, and decided to wear an outfit very similar to the pink dress she once wore during the chuunin exams.
As she was walking down one of the back streets of Konoha, she happened to run into TenTen.
"Hey." Said the sand sibling.
TenTen stared at her, a bit concerned. "Oh! You, um...decided to wear that dress."
"Yeah" replied Temari, "Just thought that it would be like old times."
TenTen then started to glare "Just what part of old times are you remembering?"
Temari stared back a bit confused, but then realized what she meant. "OH NO! I didn't mean to offend you! It's just-"
TenTen smiled at her. "It's okay! I know you didn't mean any harm!" TenTen looked a bit calmer. "Say, would you like to come with me for a moment? I have something I like to show you."
Temari-
12132.title: Temari

121321.content:
Temari says "Okay, what is it?"
TenTen grinned again. "Come on! Follow me!"

Almost ten minutes later, they were in the warehouse district of the city.
(This is odd) Temari thought, (I have never been that close to this girl. Why is she suddenly so eager to show me something.)
They soon reached one of the warehouses. It was pretty large and seemed a bit abandoned.
"It's right inside." said TenTen.
"Well, what is it?" said Temari.
"You think I'd bring you all this way just to tell you what it is now? Go on! Open the door!" TenTen responded.
Cautiously, Temari opened the door slowly.
It was dark and seemingly empty warehouse. She tried to look in deeper. From what she saw, there were three girls in there.
"Are those-"
Before Temari could finish, she felt a swift blow to the back of her head.

Temari was dazed, but she was slowly waking up with her head still hurting from the blow earlier. She tried to move, but felt restrictions. She was tied to a chair.
"Awwww, look at her struggle." said a female voice.
Temari looked in front of her to see not only TenTen, but Sakura, Ino and Hinata as well.
"What's going on?!" Cried Temari.
